about_the_game:
A World Full Of Desires


The millennium messenger came to the tree to establish a prosperous kingdom. When the king was prosperous, he quietly disappeared. In order to continue to rule the world through the name of the millennium messenger, the nobles began to fabricate false information about the millennium messenger. After obtaining a mysterious metal, the nobles began to try new refining, hoping to make immortal pills.

Unique Scene Atmosphere


The unique high-definition pixel style creates many scenes that have never been seen before

Sense Of Control


In the game, the super-control protagonist is very smooth, has a sensitive response to the blow, and uses various abilities and skills to fight against monsters.

Exploratory


There are many levels hidden in the game, waiting to be discovered and challenged. It is necessary to combine the acquired novel props to complete unknown abstract tasks

A World Full Of Desires


The millennium messenger came to the tree to establish a prosperous kingdom. When the king was prosperous, he quietly disappeared. In order to continue to rule the world through the name of the millennium messenger, the nobles began to fabricate false information about the millennium messenger. After obtaining a mysterious metal, the nobles began to try new refining, hoping to make immortal pills.

Unique Scene Atmosphere


The unique high-definition pixel style creates many scenes that have never been seen before

Sense Of Control


In the game, the super-control protagonist is very smooth, has a sensitive response to the blow, and uses various abilities and skills to fight against monsters.

Exploratory


There are many levels hidden in the game, waiting to be discovered and challenged. It is necessary to combine the acquired novel props to complete unknown abstract tasks

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: The Last Tree

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A 2D pixel-like Metrovania game, exploring the game world with a unique atmosphere. In a mysterious and huge tree world, as time goes by, trees and plants have withered, the ecology has become worse, life has become scarce, and who will save the world that is about to break.
